abilities.name: Protect Wing
abilities.effect: As long as Staraptor is your Active Pokémon, any damage done by attacks from your opponent's Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Strong Breeze
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it on top of your opponent's deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
